about:
Hi, I am Dongsuk (David) Lim! 


I was born and raised in South Korea and moved to United States around my age of 14. During regular business hours, I work as a full-time software engineer based in Washington, DC. 
 I am currently working on various projects including cloud administeration, CI/CD pipeline, DevOps, and backend development in defense industry. 
 I am especially interested in emerging cloud and machine learning technologies, and their impacts to the world. 


 When I am not working, I like to play piano. My favorite piece is the famous Canon in D by Pachelbel.
